entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who needs to be calmed down after seeing her boggart.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having just finished an exam and is greeted by Minister Fudge.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is still slightly inclined to laugh at Hermione's boggart.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Minister Fudge is introduced as a character who greets Harry and makes small talk about the weather.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: Hermione's boggart is mentioned as something that Ron is still inclined to laugh at.

relationships.description: Ron is described as someone who is still slightly inclined to laugh at Hermione's boggart.
Minister Fudge greets Harry on the top of the steps.
